meanings.definition: The act of combining or joining together
meanings.sent1: The mergings of different colors created a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent2: The mergings of flavors in the dish made it delicious.
meanings.sent3: The mergings of socks in the laundry seemed to have a mind of their own.
meanings.sent4: The mergings of voices in the choir harmonized perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The mergings of ideas in the brainstorming session led to a breakthrough.

meanings.definition: The result of combining or joining together
meanings.sent1: After the mergings of companies, a new logo was designed.
meanings.sent2: The mergings of rivers formed a larger, more powerful stream.
meanings.sent3: The mergings of ingredients in the recipe produced a mouth-watering aroma.
meanings.sent4: The mergings of cultures in the city created a vibrant community.
meanings.sent5: The mergings of talents in the team led to a successful project completion.
